blue.happening.sdk

Interface HappeningCallback


  • public interface HappeningCallback
    Implement these methods for getting callbacks of the happening network. Mandatory for Happening.register(Context, HappeningCallback).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MESSAGE_ACTION_ARRIVED 
      static int MESSAGE_ACTION_DROPPED 
      static int MESSAGE_ACTION_FORWARDED 
      static int MESSAGE_ACTION_RECEIVED 
      static int MESSAGE_ACTION_SENT 
      static int MESSAGE_TYPE_OGM 
      static int MESSAGE_TYPE_UCM 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClientAdded(HappeningClient client)
      Callback if a new network client appeared.
      void onClientRemoved(HappeningClient client)
      Callback if a network client was removed.
      void onClientUpdated(HappeningClient client)
      Callback if a network client was updated.
      void onMessageLogged(int packageType, int action)
      Callback for showing the network traffic for this device.
      void onMessageReceived(byte[] message, HappeningClient source)
      Callback if the app receives a message from another HappeningClient.
